content: **cozy up in style with this triangle basketweave cowl pattern this not only keeps you warm but elevates your outfit and showcases your handmade skills ** **size ** one size adjustable by following notes within pattern neck width 10 /25 5 cm length 17 /43 cm **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet front and back post stitches working in row and turned rounds **yarn ** #4 worsted weight 310 total yards expression fiber arts luster worsted 50% superwash merino wool 50% lyocell 200 yds/113 g or suitable substitute **tools ** us size i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
